DOC.brief_summary: hysterosalpingography can cause pain and discomfort in several ways: Use of the tenaculum to grasp the cervix and straighten the uterus for proper insertion; trans-cervical actions including measuring uterine depth, inserting the cannula; and injection of the dye
DOC.criteria: any patient came for Hysterosalpingography any patient has contraindication to Hysterosalpingography
